reviewText: This game does have older graphics but a few perks is a fast travel map, interesting story and a all around not bad hidden object game. I recommend it to gamers who love hidden object games. I run a high end system and was still able to play it will no problems except a little bit of graphic pixels at full window but no too bad.

reviewText:
An excellent and fairly long casual point-and-click adventure with many hidden-object scenes. The puzzles are for the most part original and quite fun!

Though low resolution, the graphics are gorgeous and meticulously drawn, conjuring up a vivid fantasy world. Animations have a nice slow pace to them that keeps the game feeling alive.

The weak points are the story, which lacks any element of surprise, and the voice acting, which is itself OK but doesn't match the rest of the design at all.
